product_name: Mountain House Chicken and White Bean Chili - 2 Servings
long_description: Refuel after a long day on the trail with the Mountain House Chicken and White Bean Chili freeze-dried meal. Includes chicken, white beans and vegetables in a green chili sauce. Contains 260mg of sodium per serving, less than many other freeze-dried dinners. Mix ingredients in the pouch provided with boiling water, let stand for a few minutes and then serve. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Refuel after a long day on the trail with the Mountain House Chicken and White Bean Chili freeze-dried meal.
